export var getDate=function getDate(date_obj){var current_date=date_obj;var dd=String(current_date.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');var mm=String(current_date.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');//January is 0!
var yyyy=current_date.getFullYear();current_date=yyyy+'-'+mm+'-'+dd;return current_date;};export var todayDate=function todayDate(){return getDate(new Date());};export var pastDate=function pastDate(days){var today=new Date();var past=new Date(today);past.setDate(past.getDate()-days);return getDate(past);};
